item_gp.name: Gold Coin
item_gp.description: A golden disk an inch in diameter. It's heavy, and probably worth something.

item_iron_key.name: Iron Key
item_iron_key.description: A dull iron key. Quite hefty for it's small size, it would probably fit a door.

armor_leather.name: Leather Armor
armor_leather.description: Armor made from tanned animal hide. It smells a bit funny, but it'd do the job.

weapon_dagger.name: Dagger
weapon_dagger.description: A small blade, probably made of iron. Keep the sharp end away from your body.
